TextView.android:text: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion, also known as BB2, is an Indian bilingual fantasy-action film directed by S. S. Rajamouli and written by his father K. V. Vijayendra Prasad. It was produced by Shobu Yarlagadda and Prasad Devineni under the banner Arka Media Works. Released on 28 April 2017, The film stars Prabhas, Rana Daggubati and Anushka Shetty, while Ramya Krishnan and Sathyaraj appear in prominent roles.
